amendment.description: To repeal the Volumetric Ethanol Excise Tax Credit.

action.text: Amendment SA 476 as modified, under the order of 6/15/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 27. Record Vote Number: 90.
Amendment SA 476 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S3847; text: CR S3847) To repeal the Volumetric Ethanol Excise Tax Credit.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 476 as modified, under the order of 6/15/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 27. Record Vote Number: 90.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 476 as modified, under the order of 6/15/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 27. Record Vote Number: 90.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 476 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feinstein.
